<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">But in the seats under the ceiling, in the

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">there were nobles, rulers, scholars. They too are silent.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">And their

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Perhaps <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-fbac" key="Bacon, Francis">Bacon</rs> in his <rs type="literary-work" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-fbac" key="Essays (Francis Bacon)">essays</rs> supplies a reason.</l>
